name: CI/CD to Huawei SWR and CCE

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - master  # Trigger CI/CD when code is pushed to the 'main' branch

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Build Docker image
        run: docker buildx build -t hello .

      #- name: Log in to Huawei Cloud SWR
      #  uses: huaweicloud/swr-login@v2.1.0
      #  with:
      #    access-key-id: ${{ secrets.ACCESSKEY }}
      #    access-key-secret: ${{ secrets.SECRETACCESSKEY }}
      #    region: ${{ env.REGION_ID }}

      - name: Build, Tag, and Push Image to Huawei Cloud SWR
        id: push-image
        env:
          SWR_REGISTRY: swr.${{ env.REGION_ID }}.myhuaweicloud.com
          SWR_ORGANIZATION: ${{ env.SWR_ORGANIZATION }}
          IMAGE_TAG: ${{ github.sha }}
          IMAGE_NAME: ${{ env.IMAGE_NAME }}
        run: |
          docker login -u af-south-1@304IO3JLLQP502QS8QVC -p fffabef4c79ed28cc69b074f6a0c7164341860e5f22cc3a651d883696e901238 swr.af-south-1.myhuaweicloud.com
          docker build -t $SWR_REGISTRY/$SWR_ORGANIZATION/$IMAGE_NAME:v1 .
          docker push $SWR_REGISTRY/$SWR_ORGANIZATION/$IMAGE_NAME:v1
          echo "::set-output name=image::$SWR_REGISTRY/$SWR_ORGANIZATION/$IMAGE_NAME:v1"

      - name: Configure kubectl
        uses: azure/k8s-set-context@v1
        with:
          kubeconfig: ${{ secrets.KUBE_CONFIG_DATA }}

      - name: Deploy to Huawei CCE
        run: |
          kubectl set image deployment/my-app-deployment my-app=${{ secrets.HUAWEI_SWR_REGISTRY }}/hello-world-nodejs:latest
          
    # Add more steps for deployment validation or other actions as needed
